main event: Several witnesses observed a bright, round, white object that was size of a basketball, trailing gray luminous material, and taking off rapidly at a high altitude before making a sharp turn and descending.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2330 on December 23, 1960., The object was reported to take off at about 15,000-18,000 feet., Witnesses described the object as having a bright, white color and trailing gray smoke., One witness thought they heard a light explosion but others heard nothing., All witnesses were untrained and not familiar with aircraft.
sighted object: a bright, round, white object size of a basketball
witness description: Individuals included a student and other untrained observers from Rushville, Nebraska.
